title: Sebastian the fox: the painter
creator_credit: Tim Burstall, Patrick Ryan and Eltham Films
brief_description: Sebastian the Fox enters an artist’s studio and does some painting himself, while the artist and his model are having tea. He is made to clear up the mess he makes and told to leave, but Sebastian has his revenge. Photography by Giorgio Manianele.
creator_credit_for_label: Tim Burstall, Patrick Ryan and Eltham Films
